name: Colour Burst
description:
Game modes

  • One on One: Grab the flag.
  •  Two on Two: Grab the flag.

Control options 

  • One Controller or Two controllers.

Mechanics

  • Running on your team's colour speeds you up.
  • Spread your colour by bouncing or colliding.
  • Get into the other player's goal, GET THAT FLAG. 

Description 

A light-hearted game being made for the New Blood Awards! Taking some traditional sporting concepts and making them simpler and more colourful.  The idea is to create a game you can play and share an experience with your loved ones, even the ones that don't play games.

Currently, the game works with any gamepad, you can use one and share it or use two!

Any playtesting is appreciated, leave a comment, and tell me what you think! If you could record your self-playing and share it, I would be very grateful and I'll even add you to the credits.
